message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $10,000, which is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I've done some research and I'm not sure it's worth $10,000 to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $8,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $9,000 to make this deal work.  This price still reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal.  Let me know if you're interested.

I'm still not sure I'm comfortable with $9,000. I've done some more research and I'm thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
